price: 39. Ce jour-là, ni hommes ni djinns ne seront interrogés sur leurs péchés ?
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
